title: begin
body:
...
Hello my friend. My name is: <<if $speakName == "Left">> Left [Z to continue] <<else>> Right [Z to continue] <<endif>> 

Now I change your animation
three...
<< wait 300>>
two...
<< wait 300>> 
one...
<< wait 300>> 
<< animjj >> 
<< wait 500>>
.
.
What do you want to do ? [Z to continue] 

[[ say hello |hello ]] [[ say adios |end ]]
